data.name: Dreamcharger
data.detailed_description:
You found yourself in the non-material world, the world of dreams. What are you doing here, who are you, and why are you here? The upcoming story will answer all the questions, as well as ask your own.

Play in two connected modes: a full story or a roguelike!

In the roguelike mode, you have to fight on random arenas with random bosses. Make victories, upgrade talents, get rewards. The longer you can hold out, the more valuable the reward! With their help, create items that strengthen your character in all modes.

Tired of endless battles? Return to the story mode - You will have to walk, listen or read the story, find out what happened and where you are. Why are you fighting?

In the game you have to control the character with the mouse (or any other pointer) and press the ability keys.

Features: modifiers, huge talent tree, variable strategies.
